html: 9.25.18  12:57 am   Two months ago I upgraded from a flip phone to a smart phone, irreversibly, and it has been a huge distraction for me in terms of media consumption. How do I discipline myself out of this and back to music production? I'm ashamed of myself.
9.25.18  12:55 am   I don't get why 9.22.18  9:59 pm was a question. How do you record a piece before it even exists?
9.25.18  12:42 am   What should I do if I want to learn to compose music?

9.25.18  12:23 am   is there something universal about the human experience?

     if so, what do you think it is?
9.24.18  11:43 pm   What are your interests outside of making music?
9.24.18  11:16 pm   Where did you learn to do editing like you do?
9.24.18  11:15 pm   How do I add more time?
9.24.18  10:27 pm   so how long until another "fuck the schedule"?
9.24.18  10:16 pm   What's the deal with politics?
9.24.18  10:15 pm   How do you know what life is all about?
9.24.18  10:13 pm   would you like some juice?
9.24.18  10:01 pm   if a bunch of your songs are about going places then why don't you go to those places? maybe you do, if you do, are they grand? thanks

9.24.18  9:33 pm   Hey it's me again about the song questions. Say, I know people like your songs, but if you're going to do one every 2 weeks... actually, you've been improving your strength to making those video. Maybe someday you'll be (not really possible) making daily videos again. Sure it's a challenge, but I believe in you! Okay. Here's a question. Will the next song include potato chips?

9.24.18  9:32 pm   do any of your songs represent your experience as a musician,

      or are we all looking too deep into something fun, like stupid people do?

9.24.18  9:28 pm   Does anybody exist,

     and if so, how can we continue to exist and be better?
9.24.18  8:24 pm   Do you pour cereal or milk first, when makin cereal?
9.24.18  8:21 pm   does your next song happen to be about the moon?
9.24.18  8:19 pm   How do I stop waking up at 1 o'clock in the morning?
9.24.18  7:51 pm   how to make jazz standard gigs fun and interesting to play and and also make people pay me.
9.24.18  7:35 pm   where do you lie on the spectrum between inauthentic and authentic?
9.24.18  7:30 pm   I have a rather bad drum setup, and I only have one microphone that consistently works. Should I try to make do with this for recording, or just program drums?

9.24.18  7:27 pm   I have a tendency to completely scrap song ideas that I abandon work on. Is this an okay thing to do?

      Sometimes I struggle to remember them if I try to revisit them, and that makes it seem to me like they aren't worth remembering
9.24.18  7:24 pm   what do you do to get motivated on days when resistance is kicking your ass?
9.24.18  7:24 pm   hey mom can I pleeeease have a nintendo for christmas
9.24.18  7:18 pm   If you ever went on tour, would you go to places/states where people don't usually go to (for example Arkansas)?
9.24.18  7:13 pm   ice cream?

9.24.18  6:53 pm   how can i stop feeling like i can't do anything right?

     cuz im a high school student and i had a really crappy year last year and this year started out well except now i just totally screwed up. im starting to think im just a bad student and there's nothing i can do about it. i wanna do well in school like my friends, but im not. im just stuck in the worst cycle to possibly be stuck in. what should i do
9.24.18  6:43 pm   Will you ever add an icon for your website?
9.24.18  6:16 pm   Hey, what's this piano chord that plays right before the bass comes in (about 4 sec into the song)? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WXzFCS72QIA

9.24.18  5:55 pm   Do you believe that musical talent can be something that you are born with, or is it solely a developed interest/ability?

     For example, if you weren't exposed to musical instruments and song as a kid, do you think you would be who you are today?
9.24.18  5:54 pm   Do you own a drum set?

9.24.18  5:39 pm   I really love whenever you incorporate your handwriting and drawings into your content, but that wasn't really a thing you did until a year or so ago I think. are you still adding cool things like that to your toolbox? got any plans to explore some more skills/tools like that?

9.24.18  5:32 pm   is your notebook fully updated,

      or is there stuff still left to put in like there is in the reality section?

9.24.18  5:18 pm   Have you ever pondered the possibility that there are an infinite realities, each different from the next,

     and in one of those realities the other you is more put together or happy than you?
9.24.18  5:09 pm   I don't understand any of your songs but I keep watching them anyway. Is there something wrong with me?
9.24.18  5:03 pm   are you sure about things
